name: Masako Wakamiya,  Anvitha Vijay
knownFor: The Youngest and Oldest App Developer

anecdotes.title: The Youngest Title
anecdotes.body: Anvitha is a grade 4 student from Mount View Primary School in Melbourne. She was invited, as the youngest app developer, to Apple's annual Worldwide Developer Conference in 2016.

anecdotes.title: 7 Years Old
anecdotes.body: She began coding at the age of 7 after watching tutorials on YouTube. Her first app — Smartkins Rainbow Colours – was designed to help young children learn about colours.

anecdotes.title: The Oldest Title
anecdotes.body: She asked a software developer to create more apps for the elderly. No one was interested, so she decided to teach herself coding basics and developed the app 'Hinadan'.

anecdotes.title: 60 Years Old
anecdotes.body: Masako created her first app at the age of 81, after starting to use computers at age 60.
